QuestData.Title: Just Passing Through
QuestData.Description: We must act quickly, $r! We can't risk letting those precious seeds become fully digested. They need to come out, NOW.$b$bForage up some blackroot from the riverbank just west of here and I'll make you a purgative that should get things moving.$b$bHurry now! And remember, you brought this upon yourself....
QuestData.LogDescription: Anderhol at Amberpine Lodge wants you to bring him 5 Blackroot Stalks.
QuestData.RewardText: These should do just fine...$b$b<Anderhol deftly twists the stalks, collecting their slick fluids in a tiny vial.>$b$bThere we go, now it's time to get down to business.
